bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: StackVertex cannot handle variable length RNN data
bug.description: Stack vertex: handles RNN data, but can't handle variable-length data. For example, for the masks are vstacked, which won't work for different time series lengths. Furthermore, the forward pass output size is determined from the size of the first array.
